name: Don't touch my house !
description:
In hell, monsters have found a small house in which a woodcutter lives. The woodcutter is not very happy and goes to defend his house. But he lacks help.

Help the lumberjack protect the house from the bridges. Earn coins and upgrade your weapons and home. The new levels of the house look different and have more protection.

This game is in beta testing. I would be grateful if you rate and tell your friends.
